trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles post-cache substitution.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理後快取替代的方法。

trans-unit.source: The HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback delegate, in combination with the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A> method, is used for rendering post-cache content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> controls.
trans-unit.target: HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback 委派，搭配<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A>方法，用於轉譯後的快取內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> </xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.WriteSubstitution%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A> property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control executes.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A>屬性，以指定的名稱時所叫用回呼方法的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控制項執行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution.MethodName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>

trans-unit.source: The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or on the user control that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution> control.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的回呼方法必須在頁面上，或包含的使用者控制項上的靜態方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution>

trans-unit.source: The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback delegate that takes an <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> parameter and returns a string.
trans-unit.target: 回呼方法的簽章必須符合簽章的 HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback 委派，會取得<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>參數並傳回字串。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control, rendering is independent of the page caching unless an event handler is provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控制轉譯是獨立於網頁快取供事件處理常式，除非<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event handler is present, post-cache substitution is used to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> content.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>快取後替換用來呈現，事件處理常式則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>內容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>
